rukus.text: 72|20|[Ej pajomʙar, ʙa onho] Bigu: «Man tanho Parvardigoramro mexonam va kasero ʙo U sarik namesozam»
72|21|Bigu: «Be gumon, man nametavonam ʙa sumo zijone ʙirasonam va na xajru sude»
72|22|Bigu: «[Agar man niz ʙar xilofi farmonas raftor kunam] hec kas maro dar ʙaroʙari U himojat namekunad va panohgohe cuz U namejoʙam
72|23|[Vazifai man] Tanho iʙloƣe az coniʙi Alloh taolo va [rasonidani] pajomhoi ust. Va har kas az Allohu pajomʙaras nofarmoni kunad, ʙe gumon, otasi cahannam az oni Ust, covidona dar on xohad mond»
72|24|[Kori kofiron hamcunon idoma dorad] To zamone, ki on ciro ʙa onho va'da doda suda, ʙuʙinand. On goh xohand donist, ki ci kase jovaras notavontar va cam'ijatas kamtar ast
72|25|[Ej pajomʙar] Bigu: «Man namedonam, ojo on ci ki ʙa sumo va'da doda suda, nazdik ast jo Parvardigoram zamone [dur] ʙaroi on qaror medihad»
72|26|[Alloh taolo] Donoi ƣajʙ ast va hec kasro ʙar [asrori] ƣajʙi xud ogoh namesozad
72|27|Magar rasulone, ki ononro pisandida [va ʙarguzida] ast. Pas, ʙe gumon, az pesi ruji u va pusti saras nigahʙone [az faristagon ʙaroi muhofizat az vaj] megumorad
72|28|To ʙidonad, ki [pajomʙaron] risolathoi Parvardigorasonro iʙloƣ kardaand va [Alloh taolo] ʙa on ci nazdi onhost ihota dorad va har cizero ʙa adad ʙarsumurdaast
